title: Professional Time Management
description: Communicate effectively about schedules, delays, and time commitments in gig work

phrases.english: I apologize for the delay. Traffic is heavy on this route
phrases.spanish: Disculpe la demora. El tráfico está pesado en esta ruta
phrases.pronunciation: dees-KOOL-peh lah deh-MOH-rah. el TRAH-fee-koh es-TAH peh-SAH-doh en ES-tah ROO-tah

phrases.spanish: Voy adelantado / Llego antes de lo previsto
phrases.pronunciation: voy ah-deh-lan-TAH-doh / YEH-goh AN-tes deh loh preh-VEES-toh

phrases.english: What time do you need to be there?
phrases.pronunciation: ah keh OH-rah neh-seh-SEE-tah es-TAR ah-YEE

phrases.english: We should arrive with time to spare
phrases.spanish: Deberíamos llegar con tiempo de sobra
phrases.pronunciation: deh-beh-REE-ah-mohs yeh-GAR kon tee-EM-poh deh SOH-brah

phrases.english: I'll update you if anything changes

culturalNotes.note: Being on time is critical - even 5 minutes late requires communication and apology
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Much stricter than 'hora colombiana' - lateness is seen as disrespectful

culturalNotes.note: Inform customers immediately of delays - don't wait for them to ask
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More proactive communication expected than in Colombian culture

culturalNotes.note: Give realistic ETAs - undercommit and overdeliver rather than vice versa
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Americans prefer accurate pessimistic estimate over optimistic guess

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Entiendo que tiene un vuelo. ¿A qué hora necesita estar en el aeropuerto? Tomaré la ruta más rápida y monitorizaré el tráfico.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I understand you have a flight. What time do you need to be at the airport? I'll take the fastest route and monitor traffic.
practicalScenarios.tips: Show understanding of urgency and take proactive approach

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Disculpe, hay un accidente adelante que está causando demora. Nuestro nuevo tiempo estimado de llegada es [X]. ¿Le gustaría que tome una ruta alternativa?
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: Sorry, there's an accident ahead causing delays. Our new estimated arrival time is [X]. Would you like me to take an alternate route?
practicalScenarios.tips: Explain cause, give new ETA, offer solution

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Buenas noticias - vamos adelantados. Llegaremos unos minutos antes de lo estimado.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: Good news - we're ahead of schedule. We'll arrive a few minutes earlier than estimated.
